title: Signal fault affecting train movement on Thomson–East Coast Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 汤申东海岸线信号故障影响列车运行
title_translations.ms: Ralat isyarat yang menjejaskan pergerakan kereta di Thomson–East Coast Line
title_translations.ta: தாம்சன்-கிழக்கு கடற்கரை பாதையில் ரயில் இயக்கத்தை பாதிக்கும் சமிக்ஞை தவறு

updates.text: [TEL] CLEARED: Train services have resumed progressively.

[TEL]: Due to a signal fault, trains are moving slower between Woodlands North and Caldecott in both directions. Additional travelling time of 10 minutes is expected. We apologize for the inconvenience.
